author: pohle,f.v. and nardo,s.w.
body: simplified formulas for boundary value problems of the thin-- walled circular cylinder . n. j. hoff has presented formulas which can be used in the solution of boundary-value problems of circular cylinders .  the purpose of this note is to express these results in exact simplified form,. a more detailed investigation appears elsewhere .  the notation will be that of hoff unless otherwise stated .
title: simplified formulas for boundary value problems of the thin-- walled circular cylinder .
